column1: Don't despair, Vermillion city is right ahead!
column2: No te desesperes, ¡Ciudad Carmín está justo adelante!

column1: You beat me good, I could hardly do anything!
column2: Me ganaste sin problemas, no pude hacer nada.

column1: Hey, you? Want to help me out?
Two against one, we can't possibly lose this time!
column2: Dos contra uno, ¡esta vez no podemos perder!

column1: Shame, I was really looking forward to fighting you again!
column2: ¡Qué lástima, realmente esperaba pelear contigo otra vez!

column1: Me and my sis, we fight together!
Wait, you need at least two Pokémon to fight the both of us!
column2: ¡Espera, necesitas al menos dos Pokémon para enfrentarnos a las dos!

column1: When we lose we lose together as well!
################################ Mettre celui utilisé en dernier. L'ordre des deux autre pas important. ################################
column2: ################################ Mettre celui utilisé en dernier. L'ordre des deux autre pas important. ################################

column1: How about one last fight before you reach Vermillion City?
column2: ¿Qué tal una última pelea antes de que llegues a Ciudad Carmín?

column1: You know how to handle your Pokémon!
I need to learn from you, want to do this again?
Hey, you want to help me out here?
You won't know what hit you!
I'm doing this out of love. Leave me alone!
column2: Lo hago por amor. ¡Déjame en paz!

column1: I can't lose in front of my love! Please, won't you have a rematch with me?
column2: No puedo perder frente a mi amor. ¿Quieres tener una revancha conmigo?

column1: My love will leave me in disgust.
Growlithe went back to the hotel.
You found every Growlithe! Go back to Saffron City's hotel for your reward!
column2: ¡Encontraste todos los Growlithe! Regresa al hotel de Ciudad Azafrán para tu recompensa.

column1: There are still more \V[143] lost Growlithe to find!
I'm training for my love. Don't bother me!
column2: Estoy entrenando para mi amor. ¡No me molestes!

column1: Do you want a rematch against me?
At least now  I understand, Pokémon isn't all about calculated numbers.
column2: Al menos ahora entiendo que Pokémon no se trata solo de números calculados.

column1: Won't you have a look at my bug Pokémon?
I'll just heal up my Pokémon and...
column2: Solo voy a curar a mis Pokémon y...
